I have been working as Web Developer since 2006. I am currently working as a front-end engineer at Deloitte Digital based in Dublin.

I’m a team worker and passionate about what I do. I have experience with different work environment, Multinational companies, Startup and digital agencies.

My strongest skill is client-side front-end development. And My main domain are HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SASS, LESS, PostCSS, Angular and React. On server-side, I usually code in Java and PHP. I also use GIT for version control, GruntJS, Gulp and Webpack for automating tasks and tests with Ruby(rSpec) and Jenkins. I hold a bachelor degree in Information Systems.
